complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down this task into specific testing phases: build verification, functional testing, cross-browser testing, and mobile responsiveness testing. Each subtask should focus on a specific aspect of the pre-deployment verification process.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves comprehensive testing across multiple dimensions (build, functionality, browsers, devices) with various technologies (Vite, React Router v6, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, GHL forms, Calendly, Google Maps). The complexity comes from the breadth of testing required and potential integration issues between different components.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide this into repository connection, build configuration setup, and deployment automation configuration. Each subtask should handle a specific aspect of the Vercel setup process.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Standard deployment platform setup with well-documented processes. The complexity is moderate due to specific Vite configuration requirements and environment variable setup, but Vercel's integration with GitHub is mature and reliable.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break this into deployment verification, functional testing, performance testing with Lighthouse, form submission testing, and TypeScript/React 18 feature validation. Each subtask should focus on a specific validation area.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to comprehensive testing requirements including performance metrics (Core Web Vitals > 90), end-to-end form testing, and validation of modern React features. Multiple testing tools and methodologies are required.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate into Cloudways backup creation, WordPress export, local archive storage, and backup integrity verification. Each subtask should handle a specific backup method or verification step.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving multiple backup methods and platforms. Requires understanding of Cloudways infrastructure, WordPress export tools, and backup verification processes. Critical for rollback capability.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into Vercel domain addition, GoDaddy DNS configuration, SSL certificate verification, and DNS propagation monitoring. Each subtask should focus on a specific aspect of the domain setup process.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: DNS configuration can be complex with potential propagation delays and SSL certificate issues. Involves coordination between multiple services (Vercel, GoDaddy) and requires careful monitoring of propagation status across geographic locations.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into HTTPS accessibility verification, navigation testing, third-party integration testing (GHL, Calendly, Google Maps), performance validation, cross-device testing, and comprehensive functional testing. Each subtask should focus on a specific verification area.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity as this is the final production validation with strict performance requirements (< 3 seconds load time), multiple third-party integrations, and comprehensive cross-device testing. Any issues here directly impact user experience.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Fresh WordPress Installation and Basic Configuration
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into WordPress installation on Cloudways, Rank Math SEO plugin setup, permalink and sitemap configuration, and security plugin installation. Each subtask should handle a specific configuration area.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Standard WordPress setup with moderate complexity due to specific SEO plugin configuration, custom permalink structure, and security hardening requirements. Cloudways platform adds some complexity to the installation process.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate into GeneratePress theme installation, child theme creation, design system implementation (colors, fonts), header/footer customization, and responsive design implementation. Each subtask should focus on a specific customization area.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to extensive design matching requirements, custom template creation, and responsive design implementation. Requires deep WordPress theming knowledge and careful attention to design consistency across platforms.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Reverse Proxy Configuration and URL Routing
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into Vercel rewrite configuration, caching header setup, SEO URL structure validation, WordPress navigation configuration, and comprehensive URL pattern testing. Each subtask should handle a specific aspect of the proxy setup.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving advanced Vercel configuration, proper caching strategies, and seamless integration between two different platforms. Requires deep understanding of reverse proxy concepts and SEO implications.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: React Site Blog Integration and Final Testing
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into React site blog link updates, navigation integration, external link handling implementation, visual transition optimization, comprehensive integration testing, and SEO validation. Each subtask should focus on a specific integration aspect.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Highest complexity as this involves seamless integration between React and WordPress platforms, comprehensive end-to-end testing, SEO validation, and performance optimization of the complete integrated solution. This is the final critical task that ensures the entire system works cohesively.
